title: New $190M Fort Worth factory makes equipment for data centers
content: Siemens opened a $190 million manufacturing facility in Fort Worth last week to produce electrical equipment for data centers. ill also use vendors from Texas and North America as part of the company's move toward regionalizing production. The facility w What's next: The factory is near a Tarrant County College campus, and Siemens plans to initiate a workforce development partnership with the school.
